org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.memorydb

Class DropWhileConnectingTest.AccessThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.memorydb.DropWhileConnectingTest.AccessThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    DropWhileConnectingTest

    private static class DropWhileConnectingTest.AccessThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Access thread connection to the database and performing a simple SQL select query. Will accept a few specific exceptions as the database is deleted "under its feet", all other exceptions are considered a failure and will be reported.
